project.name: The jsaSound API
project.description: The jsaSound API for building sound models with Web Audio

baseSM.js.name: baseSM.js
baseSM.js.description: Provides the base class for all sound models

classitems.description: Factory for sound models, returned by loading this module.
classitems.name: Anonymous - returned on module load

params.name: i_node
params.description: I forget.

params.name: input
params.description: nodes to make available for connections from other models and nodes

params.name: output
params.description: nodes to make available for connections to other models and nodes

params.name: i_text
params.description: text descritption of model, hints, etc

return.description: text descritption of model, hints, created with setAboutText

classitems.description: Creates a parameter that will be used to control the model and provide information
classitems.name: registerParam

params.name: i_name
params.description: name to expose to the world for this param

params.name: i_type
params.description: type ["range", "URL"]

params.name: i_val
params.description: initial value

params.name: i_f
params.description: function to execute when setParam(name, val) is called.

classitems.description: Grabs a parameter from a child model, registers it on this model, and just reflects all calls to the child
classitems.name: registerChildParam

params.name: childPname
params.description: name of the child parameter to expose

params.name: parentPname
params.description: name to use for the parameter

return.description: the number of paramters the model exposes

params.name: index
params.description: index of the parameter whose name you want

return.description: the name of the parameter with the secified index

classitems.description: Get specified information about a parameter
classitems.name: getParam

params.name: i_name
params.description: the name of the param you want info about

params.name: i_prop
params.description: on of ["name", "type", "val", "normval", "min" or "max"]

return.description: the value of the property you requested

classitems.description: Set the parameter using values in [0,1]
classitems.name: setParamNorm

params.name: i_name
params.description: the name of the param you want to set

params.name: i_val
params.description: the value to set the parameter

classitems.description: set the parameter using values using its own units in [min,max]
classitems.name: setParam

params.name: i_name
params.description: the name of the param you want to set

params.name: i_val
params.description: the value to set the parameter

params.name: i_time
params.description: what time to play (recommended use: 0 or no argument; use schedule(t,func) to scheudle play in the future)

classitems.description: Override this in your sound model
classitems.name: onPlay

params.name: i_time
params.description: time to play (can be fed to Web Audio API nodes in your override)

params.name: i_time
params.description: time to release  (recommended use: 0 or no argument; use schedule(t,func) to scheudle releases in the future)

classitems.description: Override this in your sound model  to send the model in to its release phase
classitems.name: onRelease

params.name: i_time
params.description: time to release (can be fed to Web Audio API nodes in your override)

classitems.description: Stop the model from playing, disconnects it from output so it won't waste system resources anymore. Your onRelease() method should schedule or call stop when it is done
classitems.name: stop

params.name: i_time
params.description: time to stop  (recommended use: 0 or no argument; use schedule(t,func) to scheudle stops in the future)

classitems.description: override this in your sound model  (optional)
classitems.name: onStop

params.name: i_time
params.description: time to stop (can be fed to Web Audio API nodes)

classitems.description: test a parameter number for existence
classitems.name: testPName

params.name: i_ind
params.description: index of parameter

return.description: either the parmaeter name (if it exists) or undefined

classitems.description: schedule a function to run in the future (uses a queue and a single timer)
classitems.name: schedule

params.name: t
params.description: time to execute

params.name: {Function
params.description: function to execute at time t

classitems.description: Clear the queue of all future events for this model.
classitems.name: qClear

classitems.description: Start recording audio output from the model
classitems.name: startRecording

classitems.description: Stop recording audio output from the model
classitems.name: stopRecording
